transcript:
Executive: Hello, hi, good afternoon, Kishan ji, Humaira bol rahi hu. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Boliye madam, kharab hai mamla bahut kharab hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Sahi nahi hai, aapne pucha kaise ho, sahi nahi hai, gadbad hai.
Executive: Sir, business ki to baat kar matlab aise normally main aapse puch rahi hu kaise hain. Baki business ke bare mein to mujhe knowledge hai hi. Kya chal raha hai, kaise chal raha hai uska to janti hu main services ko leke.
Executive: Baki aapne Avni ke liye feedback diya tha, account manager se koi problem aa rahi hai? Not satisfied? Hai?
Customer: Not satisfied, not satisfied.
Executive: Account manager se?
Customer: Account manager nahi IndiaMART se.
Executive: Okay. IndiaMART ke liye baat kar lete hain but vaise wo feedback jo hota hai wo account manager ke liye hota hai ki aapko account manager se to madam ab ek kaam kiya to aap paise diya to paise return karwa do ya phir kuch aur kar do aise kaise chalega kaam?
Customer: Koi customer lead aa rahi hai to wo wo sold out ho sold out ho rahi hai kaise karenge phir kaise kaam chalega?
Executive: Sir agar buyleads post ho rahi hai, sold out aa rahi hai to aap please thoda sa active rahiye.
Customer: Kitne mahine nikal gaye aap check karo ek baar kab ka liya hua hai, July ka liya hua hai na?
Executive: Yes sir. Janti hu main kitna time ho gaya hai, July ka liya hua hai aapka services.
Customer: Ha to paanch mahine nikal jayenge. Ek baat batao. Suno sir. Aisa to nahi hai ki buyleads IndiaMART pe post ho nahi rahi hai. Maine Avni ko connect karne se pehle maine khud check kiya hai 24 ghante ke 22 ghante ke andar ki aapki 15 plus buyleads hain jo Temple Marble ki sold out ho rahi hai India level pe. Usme se main do teen agar Rajasthan ki level ki hata bhi deti hu na uske baad bhi aaram se 12-13 buyleads aaram se mujhe dikh rahi hai 24 ghante ke andar ki. Plus aisa bhi nahi hai ki aap nahi consume kar rahe ho. Aap bhi ho daily ke daily matlab check kar rahe ho, connect kar rahe ho.
Customer: Consume mujhe zero zero hua hai pura.
Executive: Kya cheez zero ho raha hai?
Customer: Isme zero dikha raha hai na mere mere jo lead hai wo sari ki sari lead nikal li hai maine to.
Executive: Buyleads aap connect kar rahe ho plus buyleads sold out bhi jaldi ho rahi hai. Sir uske liye thoda sa madam main to nikal bhi raha hu nikal bhi raha hu lekin wo kuch kaam ke nahi aa raha kuch nahi kaam mein nahi aa raha hai ab uska koi nichod hai to kar do warna aap services ka aap bhi services ka jante hain ki competition kya hai, cheeze kaisi hain, kis cheez mein aap deal kar rahe hain. Aapke local mein itna competition hai uske accordingly hi aapko aa raha hai jispe ki aap bhi thoda samajhte hi hain is cheez ko. Agar aap offline kaam karo ya online kaam karo koi bhi karo market mein competition hota hai to uski wajah se business influence hota hi hai. Right?
Customer: To kya kare ab batao aap.
Executive: Main aapko ek cheez dekhiye sir maine to aapko suggestion diye the do. Last time bhi wahi suggestion main aapko abhi bhi dungi. Dekhiye abhi aap jo services buyleads use kar rahe hain that's enough thoda aapko active rehne ki zarurat hai. Kyunki agar business mein nahi hota buyleads nahi aa rahi hoti ya business generate nahi ho raha hota jaise ki to main apni team se aake baat karti. Aap product line mein India level pe jisme aap kaam kar rahe ho usme aaram se itni buyleads post ho rahi hai ki agar hum thoda sa active rahe na sir to aaram se aapka business conversion ho sakta hai. Plus dusri cheez agar main batau to ye basic service hai. Theek hai? Basic service mein bhi aapko response milta hai par thoda slow milta hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai? Agar aap aur bhi fast response chahte hain ya phir aise kuch hai cheezon ko leke bhi to it's your choice sir. Agar aap chahte hain to aap karwa sakte hain. Agar nahi chahte to aap mat karaiye koi aapko nahi kehta hai na force kar raha hai. Theek hai? It's just a suggestion. Kyunki ye do tarike hain. Kyunki ye basic service hai sir. Company ki policy hai. Aap basic service lete ho to agar basic mein 50 log kaam kar rahe hain to aap 50 logo mein to ek first number pe aa sakte ho. Lekin aapke upar jinhone premium service li hai aap unke upar to nahi dikha paoge kyunki wo company ki policy hai visibility ki cheeze hain ye. Ab visibility to company ki policy ke according hi hogi ye cheez main wahi aapko batana chah rahi hu. Aap apni cheeze dekho ki aap kahan dikh rahe ho aur competition kahan hai. Kyunki aap khud socho sir ek customer hai aap customer ho ya main customer hu main kya karungi jaake agar mujhe koi cheez chahiye hogi to? Google pe search karungi. Google mujhe IndiaMART dikhayega us page pe main jaungi. Mere phone ki screen hai phone pe baith ke lagbhag 90% customer phone pe hi dekhte hain koi cheez unhe dekhna ho to.
Customer: Theek hai madam, koi koi theek theek koi baat nahi isme koi nichod aane wala nahi hai theek hai rakhiye.
Executive: Dekhiye thoda
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states business is not going well.

- Feels buyleads are not converting into sales.

- Wants a refund or alternative solution.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about competition in the market.

- Executive suggested to be more active.

- Executive explained about basic and premium services.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, competition
